TEXT.TITLE: VMS MORTGAGE INVESTORS <VMTGZ> RAISES PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: VMS Mortgage Investors LP II said it raised its first quarter 1987 cash dividend to 21 cts from 20 cts the prior quarter payable May 14, 1987, to shareholders of record April One, 1987. Reuter
